meta.title: About TmpMail Team - Dedicated to Building the Most Secure Temporary Email Platform
meta.description: Learn about the TmpMail team and our mission: providing free, secure, ad-free temporary email services for global users. Focused on privacy protection, helping users stay away from spam, building the most reliable disposable email platform.

hero.title: About
hero.subtitle: TmpMail is a free, secure, and easy-to-use temporary email service that helps you protect your privacy and avoid spam
hero.description: TmpMail is a free, secure, and easy-to-use temporary email service that helps you protect your privacy and avoid spam

instant.title: Instant Creation
instant.description: No registration required, generate temporary email addresses with one click, start using immediately

privacy.title: Privacy Protection
privacy.description: Protect your real email address, avoid spam and privacy leaks

global.title: Global Access
global.description: Support global user access, no geographical restrictions, use anytime, anywhere

free.title: Completely Free
free.description: Free to use forever, no hidden fees, no ads

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.description: In the digital age, privacy protection is becoming increasingly important. We are committed to providing users with simple and secure temporary email services, allowing everyone to easily protect their privacy.

simple.title: Simple and Easy
simple.description: No complex registration process, get a temporary mailbox with one click

secure.title: Safe and Reliable
secure.description: Using the latest security technology to protect your email content

improve.title: Continuous Improvement
improve.description: We continuously optimize our services to provide users with a better experience

cta.title: Ready to Get Started?
